Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Tempers continue to flare on the [[DM.Factions[faction_Marik],Free Worlds League]] system of [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Tiber(FWL)],Tiber]], where local labor unions have been in revolt since late January.  The revolts took a violent turn in the past month and [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMarikFWLM],FWLM]] forces, including elements of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFWLMRegulanHussars],Regulan Hussars]] were brought in to subdue the locals.



Mostly quite in recent years, there has been some activity throughout the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRimwardPeriphery],Rimward Periphery]] with saber rattling amongst some of the minor powers.  There has also been an increase in pirate attacks on outlying systems in that region.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Efforts continue throughout known space to aid those impacted by the war, with supplies being diverted from various ComStar storehouses to those in need.  Requests can be made through the normal channels.



In our continued drive to preserve the past for your future, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreStarLeague],Star League]] archeological discoveries can be reported to your local [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHPG],HPG]], we will be happy to assist recovering and evaluating any artifacts discovered.





This has been the CNB March broadcast.
